<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocated by either the VM, or by the linker in a static compiler.  A global</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// variable may have an initial value, which is copied into the executables .data</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocate space for exactly one operand</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#af2c8efc829b793c13bc67f6ee0861889"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">operator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> s) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> User::operator </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(s, AllocMarker); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// delete space for exactly one operand as created in the corresponding new operator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Provide fast operand accessors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a30a5542d525647ee50cfec3fb04bc208"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a30a5542d525647ee50cfec3fb04bc208">DECLARE&#95;TRANSPARENT&#95;OPERAND&#95;ACCESSORS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Definitions have initializers, declarations don&#39;t.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a1c66d4eff947253e7610a66379974d63"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a1c66d4eff947253e7610a66379974d63">hasInitializer</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a32e606ac4c88f71f14212e42b808e7f4">isDeclaration</a>(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// hasDefinitiveInitializer - Whether the global variable has an initializer,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and any other instances of the global (this can happen due to weak</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// linkage) are guaranteed to have the same initializer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note that if you want to transform a global, you must use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// hasUniqueInitializer() instead, because of the &#42;&#95;odr linkage type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @a = global SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is both definitive and unique.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @b = global weak SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is neither definitive nor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// unique.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// @c = global weak&#95;odr SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is definitive, but not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// unique.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#aec2d700d8b1e57f830a673c39a1f30dc"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#aec2d700d8b1e57f830a673c39a1f30dc">hasDefinitiveInitializer</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a1c66d4eff947253e7610a66379974d63">hasInitializer</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The initializer of a global variable may change to something arbitrary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at link time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">      !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#aa1558e13ceef68db8ea9f4e3b5a64cbd">isInterposable</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The initializer of a global variable with the externally&#95;initialized</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// marker may change at runtime before C++ initializers are evaluated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">      !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a0f6dab3350ff78735031a6a62f344f18">isExternallyInitialized</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// hasUniqueInitializer - Whether the global variable has an initializer, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// any changes made to the initializer will turn up in the final executable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#ad9379319a0f19f0c42b5ee18d9f02373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#ad9379319a0f19f0c42b5ee18d9f02373">hasUniqueInitializer</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to be sure this is the definition that will actually be used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a904b8b68c7e4e888158b03f0eae0e4d5">isStrongDefinitionForLinker</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is not safe to modify initializers of global variables with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// external&#95;initializer marker since the value may be changed at runtime</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// before C++ initializers are evaluated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// getInitializer - Return the initializer for this global variable.  It is</Highlight></CodeLine>
